name: 逐步口譯（英譯中）（一）
description: This course initiates students into the world of professional conference interpreting. The objective is to help students understand what conference interpreting is and acquire the basic skills needed to perform consecutive interpreting.
goals: To help students understand what conference interpreting is
To help students acquire the basic skills needed to perform consecutive interpreting
syllabus: This course will progress in tandem with CI into English during the first few weeks of the semester. The class will consist of both lectures and practices. Readings and assignments will be given throughout the semester. Students are required to complete all assignments and practice after class hours.

methodologies.note: This course will progress in tandem with CI into English during the first few weeks of the semester. The class will consist of both lectures and practices.
